job_title: Senior Manager in Worthing, West Sussex, South East England, England
cons: Lack of racial and financial diversity in terms of employees (and patients), basically treat their staff really unkindly, seen to tick the boxes on the surface but definitely do not care about staff at all.  Very unstable management and lack of job security. If your face doesn’t fit they will find a way to get you out. Lots of better places to work than this, sadly, as it’s a great place for patients with affluent families or people who may help with fundraising, but not a genuine community facility.
